name: Monster Boy Doctor (Funigami Games)
description:
On the first day of his job after inheriting his late grandfather’s veterinary clinic, Zaru Kotamu learns that for a good part of four years now, the clinic has also been secretly offering medical services to monsters without having any proper license. With the lead monster doctor on holiday due to "circumstances", and a snow-storm raging outside, he is stuck with a patient (a cat boy who won't stop flirting), a lazy nurse (a wolf boy who transformed his regular nurse dress into a punk rock costume), and an inspection officer (a vampire), who is all too eager about bringing down the clinic. Among these mad fellows of cuckoo-land, an unreliable power box, and a burdening snow, can love blossom?

SpecificationMinimumRecommendedOperating SystemWindows® 7 32-bitWindows® 10 64-bit or laterProcessorDual-core processor, 2.4 GHz Quad-core processor, 2.5 GHz or fasterMemory4 GB RAM8 GB RAM or higherStorage69mb69mb
